refactorings_applied: Replace raw execAsync tmux commands with sendSpecialKey() abstraction (DRY)
Remove unused exec/promisify imports from codex.ts
Fix 3 unhandled promise rejections in claude-session timeout tests
commits: ed59282: refactor(#163): improve code quality and fix test stability
message: Refactoring complete. Replaced raw shell commands with tmux abstraction layer (sendSpecialKey), removed unnecessary imports from codex.ts, and fixed 3 unhandled promise rejections in test suite. All 2670 tests pass. ESLint and TypeScript checks clean. Build succeeds.
